name: wp.thepoliticalrev.org
description: Welcome to the Github repository for The Political Revolution's Wordpress setup. It is built upon the [Sage 8.5](https://github.com/roots/sage/releases/latest) starter theme and sports a modern development workflow.

scripts.build: cd wp-content/themes/thepoliticalsage && npm install && npm run-script build
scripts.start: docker-compose up -d && cd wp-content/themes/thepoliticalsage && npm install && bower install && gulp watch
